product_name: Hennessy Hammock Explorer Ultralight Asym Classic Hammock
long_description: At 10 ft. long, the Explorer Ultralite Asym Classic from Hennessy Hammock was designed for anyone under 250 lbs. or more than 6 ft. tall--you get more comfort without the weight.
short_description: At 10 ft. long, the Explorer Ultralite Asym Classic from Hennessy Hammock was designed for anyone under 250 lbs. or more than 6 ft. tall--you get more comfort without the weight.
